name: Moonlight Drop
description: For the days she chooses grace over noise — these dome pearl studs celebrate her quiet strength and timeless elegance.

name: Molten Hoop Earrings
description: Born from her bold spirit — these molten hoops are made for moments when she owns the room, unapologetically.

name: Flower Tassel Earrings
description: Like the moment she blossoms — these floral tassels capture the joy of becoming, blooming, and shining on her own terms.

name: Oval Drop Hoops Earrings
description: Crafted for evenings that turn into memories — these elegant ovals are her companion through warmth, nostalgia, and quiet confidence.

name: Serenity Frame Hoops
description: A quiet moment of grace — these white enamel-framed hoops echo her calm confidence, perfect for the days she rewrites her own story

name: Teardrop Earrings
description: In a story of joy, of growth, or of silent strength, wear your journey with pride

name: Snail Coil Earrings
description: For the woman who’s ever-evolving — these spiral coils capture the journey within, where every twist tells a story of resilience and rebirth.

name: Pause & Poise Studs
description: For moments between chaos and calm — these delicate comma studs remind her to pause, breathe, and own her space with quiet poise.

name: Orbit Whisper – Gold Spiral Stud Earrings
description: Inspired by the orbit of her thoughts — this one-revolution spiral with a golden sphere reflects her centered grace in a world that keeps spinning.

name: Ivory Bloom Trio – Floral Gold Stud Earrings
description: Three delicate white blooms, kissed with golden centers — made for soft beginnings and bold returns.

name: Auric Curve – Gold Dome Hoop Earrings
description: Bold curves, gold shine — made for days when her presence speaks before she does

name: Crystal Flora – Golden AD Studs
description: Petals kissed with shimmer, leaves traced in golden — for moments when she wants to glow without trying.

name: Verdant Crest – Gold Leaf Curve Studs
description: Leaves curl into form with quiet power — crafted for her graceful rise, one season at a time.

name: Lustre Frame – Gold & AD Square Stud Earrings
description: A golden frame cradles a crystal core — bold geometry with just the right shimmer.

name: Bloombound – Gold Floral AD Studs
description: Not fully bloomed, yet already radiant — crafted for the woman who shines in every phase.

name: Triloop Gleam – Mixed Metal Stud Earrings
description: Three loops. Three shades. One energy — for the woman who holds multitudes in motion.

name: Linear Luxe – Twin Square Drop Earrings
description: Clean lines. Pure gold. Quiet luxury for the woman who doesn’t need to speak to be seen.

name: Echo Layers – Textured Trio Drop Earrings
description: Raw Golden look. Organic dents. Layers that echo her depth — imperfect, unforgettable.

name: Bound & Bold – Textured Drop Hoop Earrings
description: A rugged square meets a golden ring — for the woman who defines her own edges.

name: Golden Echo – Textured Double Disc Earrings
description: Two golden circles, organically textured — made for the woman whose silence speaks volumes.

name: Hearts Aligned – AD Love Ring
description: Two hearts, one sparkle — for moments when love aligns within and beyond.

name: Silver Icon – Cartier Band Ring
description: Unapologetically classic — for the one who wears confidence like metal.

name: Bronze Luxe – Copper Tone Cartier Ring
